content: 43 47 sts on needle next row k2 sl1 k1 psso k to end 19 21 23 26 28 30 sts work each side of neck separately next row p to end next row ws neck edge p2 p2tog p to end repeat last 2 row 2 2 2 3 3 3 times more 17 19 21 23 25 27 sts 20 22 24 27 29 31 sts work 6 8 8 8 8 10 row without shaping next row k to last 4 sts k2tog k2 19 21 23 26 28 30 sts cast off next row p to end repeat last 2 row 2 2 2 3 3 3 times more 17 19 21 23 25 27 sts work 1 3 3 3 3 5 row without shaping next row p4 2 3 4 2 3 m1 p3 m1 3 5 5 5 7 7 times p4 2 3 4 2 3 21 25 27 29 33 35 sts 5 back shape sleeve top cast off 7 8 9 10 11 12 sts at beg of next 4 row work exactly as given for front until ** is reached 11 13 13 13 13 13 sts 51 57 63 69 73 79 sts cast off rem 11 13 13 13 13 13 sts work 4 6 6 8 8 10 row more neckband shape neck next row k20 22 24 26 28 30 turn and leave rem join right shoulder seam with rs facing and using 3 25mm needles 31 35 39 43 45 49 sts on needle pick up and knit 7 sts evenly along purl sts of front shoulder edging work each side of neck separately 8 10 10 12 12 14 sts evenly down left side of neck knit across 9 11 13 13 13 15 sts left on holder for front neck pick up and next row ws neck edge p2 p2tog p to end knit 12 14 14 16 16 18 sts evenly up right side of front neck 8 sts 19 21 23 25 27 29 sts evenly down right side of back neck knit across 11 13 15 17 17 19 next row k to last 4 sts k2tog k2 18 20 22 24 26 28 sts sts left on holder for back of neck pick up and knit 5 sts evenly up next row p2 p2tog p to end 17 19 21 23 25 27 sts left side of back neck shaping and 7 sts evenly along purl st of back work 6 row without shaping shoulder edging 67 75 79 85 85 93 sts cast off next row ws k to end with rs facing and working on rem 31 35 39 43 45 49 sts beg with row 1 work 2 row in rib as set on front slip centre 11 13 15 17 17 19 sts onto a stitch holder for neckband next row rib 4 cast off 2 sts rib to end rejoin yarn to rem
